alert.note: Alert for Iron (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 15 at 2:55PM MDT until June 15 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for...Kanarra Creek...Kanarra Falls... Within southeastern Iron County in southern Utah... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 255 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. With existing elevated stream flows, flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Kanarra Creek, Kanarra Falls, Kanarraville... FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
